titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (S. 1059) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2000 for military activities of the Department of Defense, for military construction, and for defense activities of the Department of Energy, to prescribe personnel strengths for such fiscal year for the Armed Forces, and for other purposes.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to S. 1059 with 1 hour of general debate.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-316, by Mrs. Myrick.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 108.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 288.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/14/1999--Introduced. Waives all points of order against the consideration of the conference report on S. 1059 (Department of Defense and Department of Energy defense activities authorization).
